game.name: Fruit Casket
game.categories: Single-player, Color Alternatives, Keyboard Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Survive and thrive in Fruit Casket! Match fruits and use power ups to make your Hi-Score soar, and unlock more colorful bugs. The longer you survive, the harder it gets. Don't get smooshed or starve to avoid it becoming your Fruit Casket.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive and thrive in Fruit Casket! Match fruits and use power ups to make your Hi-Score soar, and unlock more colorful bugs. The longer you survive, the harder it gets. Don't get smooshed or starve to avoid it becoming your Fruit Casket.
